sub_title: Global Director of Sales Operations, Intertrust Group, a CSC Company | Leaders in corporate client, fund, capital markets and private wealth services
summary:
Hi, thanks for looking me up. I’m the Global Director of Sales Operations at Intertrust Group, specializing in corporate strategy and marketing for financial services. I've been fortunate to work with some amazing people first at ASB Bank in New Zealand, and now at Intertrust in the Netherlands. My ever-evolving skillset includes acquisition & lifecycle marketing, data analytics, developing strategic partnerships, business strategy, sales operations, experiment design and coaching.

When you come to Intertrust, you expect a focus on quality, personal service and attention to detail. You expect it delivered by highly professional people with uncompromising integrity. Intertrust delivers high-quality, tailored corporate, fund, capital market and private wealth services to its clients, with a view to building long-term relationships. Intertrust works with global law firms and accountancy firms, multinational corporations, financial institutions, fund managers, high net worth individuals and family offices. Today, we have thousands of specialists working all around the globe, including the world’s most important financial centres. As a result, you get a world of local expertise working with you to meet your goals.

I value any company that’s tech focused, growth-centric and has innovation in its DNA. Sharing these values is why I work hard to stay relevant, agile and always evolve. 

On a personal note, I'm a huge sports fan having played rugby, cricket, football and tennis and I'm an enthusiastic but not very skilled snowboarder. I also enjoy reading a good book or spending time with friends and family.

Let’s connect.

James.Gibson@intertrustgroup.com
IntertrustGroup.com

treasury_media.description: We’re your strategic partner when it comes to tailored, holistic solutions to tackle the complex world of fund structuring, operational efficiency, governance and global regulation. We work with some of the largest and most experienced fund managers...

projects.title: ASB All Blacks Ambition Series
projects.description: In 2015, we delved into the "team behind the team" at the All Blacks to find out what it was outside of athletic skills and talent that made them such a well oiled machine. The five interviews we did with senior All Blacks and All Blacks Sevens coaches and management offers unique insights into how the disciplines of high performance sport can be transferred to the business world.

contributors.headline: Global Director of Sales Operations, Intertrust Group, a CSC Company | Leaders in corporate client, fund, capital markets and private wealth services

projects.title: The ASB Strategic Insights Panel
projects.description:
A group of senior business leaders from large corporates, the education sector and technology companies have joined forces and set a 5 year goal of doubling the growth rate of New Zealand’s GDP per capita through innovation.

The Strategic Insights Panel was created by ASB and KPMG after having conversations with customers about what more the private sector could do to boost New Zealand's economic growth and resolve the rising gap between the haves and have-nots.

This was one of my last key strategic projects at ASB, and one I'm now extremely happy to see being profiled in one of New Zealand's leading business publications, the National Business Review.

contributors.headline: Global Director of Sales Operations, Intertrust Group, a CSC Company | Leaders in corporate client, fund, capital markets and private wealth services
Practice Lead, Auckland - Strategy & Consulting, Accenture NZ
Marketing, Communications, Sustainability and Change-maker for Businesses

profile_positions.description:
By the time you get to the end of this sentence the world will have changed more rapidly than in any time in history. It seems that each day our advanced information technologies make decision-making that much quicker. And smarter. Creating new and exciting opportunities. Often on the other side of the globe.

Corporate Services
Let’s face it, in today’s fast-paced world of opportunities you need to move quickly. If this involves setting up a company in a far-off jurisdiction, for instance, we have a reputation for providing flawless execution under tight deadlines.

Fund Services
Thoroughly. That’s how much we understand your business. Knowledge, after all, is the critical component of value. From design and formation to administration, our world-class professionals have the expertise and insights you need to help you create and manage whatever type of funds that best meet your individual needs.

Capital Markets
Because of the complex nature of Capital Markets, you need a high level of expertise on your team. One with the knowledge and insight to develop the foresight needed to see the results of your decisions in the future.

Private Wealth Services
Are you looking to future-proof your wealth? Do you want to hand over control of your assets to the next generation? In the most efficient manner? Or maybe you’re considering a wider goal with a charitable contribution or foundation? Perhaps you even hold personal and business assets internationally?
profile_positions.title: Global Director of Sales Operations

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:

- Acquisition strategy development and optimization for a global sales force of over 2,000 people
- Retention program mapping and management for cross-sell, coordinated markets, partnerships and key client segments
- Market intelligence and commercial reporting including trend analysis, data-modeling and forecasting
- Manage the creation of business collateral, training materials, internal communications and insights to equip our business channels for success
- Internal tech enablement and infrastructure updates such as e-training, CRM, workflow optimization and efficiencies
- Line manager for the Global Sales Team and a key contact for all senior management
profile_positions.title: Global Commercial Strategy Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:

- Go-to-Market strategy, road-mapping and execution of product launches for capital
markets, transaction banking, trade finance and merchant service segments
- Adoption and retention analysis that fed into rapid experimentation and marketing
tactics
- CVP, messaging frameworks and enablement materials to drive easy articulation for
commercial and sales staff
- Worked closely with Product to identify and sharpen product offering based on
customer needs and competition disruption
- Performance and partnership campaign marketing within B2B, Enterprise
communities including a strategic partnership with KPMG to launch the Strategic Insights Panel, a group of leading business and political minds brought together to drive the strategic roadmap for technology in New Zealand
- Market intelligence and commercial reporting including trend analysis, data-
modeling and forecasting
- Project and operational excellence including being the key business contact for the launch of a completely revamped banking website
- One of three senior managers guiding the Consultancy Services team and a key contact for Senior Management at the bank
profile_positions.title: Senior Go-to-Market Manager - Consultancy Services

profile_positions.description:
Leading the development of strategic marketing campaigns and physical and digital sales material to support the sales targets of ASB's frontline business and corporate banking divisions as well as raising the awareness and consideration of ASB with New Zealand business owners.

A key achievement was the launch of the ASB Business Ambition Series. These were interviews with key management of the New Zealand All Blacks on the overlap between high performance sport and corporate strategy.
profile_positions.title: Associate Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: My role as an Assistant Marketing Manager entails developing campaigns and maintaining collateral for ASB Bank's existing small business and corporate clients, as well as prospective clients in both market segments.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: This graduate role involved 5 'rotations' around different parts of ASB Bank, including product management, innovation and design, operational risk and performance management, front line customer service and marketing.
profile_positions.title: Graduate; Strategy, Payments and Products
